com.isotrol.impe3.gui.common.error
Interface IErrorMessageResolver

All Known Implementing Classes:
AErrorMessageResolver, APmsErrorMessageResolver, CategoriesServiceErrorMessageResolver, ComponentsErrorMessageResolver, ConnectorsErrorMessageResolver, ContentTypeErrorMessageResolver, CurrentUserErrorMessageResolver, ExternalServiceErrorMessageResolver, PageErrorMessageResolver, PortalsServiceErrorMessageResolver, PortalUsersServiceErrorMessageResolver, SessionErrorMessageResolver, SimpleErrorMessageResolver, UsersServiceErrorMessageResolver
public interface IErrorMessageResolver

Represents classes with the ability of translating an error to a human readable internationalized message.

Author:
Andrei Cojocaru

Method Summary
 String getMessage(Throwable error, String opMessage)
          Returns the error message that corresponds to the passed error.
 

Method Detail

getMessage

String getMessage(Throwable error,
                  String opMessage)
Returns the error message that corresponds to the passed error.

Parameters:
error - thrown error
opMessage - message that contains information about the operation that failed. Example:
"The category could not be saved".
This message will be shown first, before a message that contains information about the particular exception type.
Returns:
the error message that corresponds to the passed error.
